entries.title: British cross-dressing model takes explicit photos in public places, LOVES to 'play' with their lady dong
entries.description:
Reporter Andy Ngo recently uncovered a British cross-dressing model named Rosemary Times who likes to take photos of himself in public places. With his penis exposed. Completely out in the open. No underwear. Nothing. Just penis.

You may be shocked to hear that this upset people. Such prudes.

A Twitter user with the handle "@troonytoons" posted censored images of Rosemary in public places with his junk hanging out. Rosemary apparently shared these images to his Flickr account in the group "Transgender Cafe."

\u201cRosemarytimes2 on Flickr, likes to share pictures to the group \u201cTransgender Cafe\u201d exposing himself in public\u201d
— TroonyToons (@TroonyToons) 1673202875

After some sleuthing, internet peeps were able to trace the location of these photos to Nottingham's Victoria Centre mall. The mall gave a short statement to the Nottingham Post newspaper regarding the incident: "We are aware of the tweets in question and are looking into the incident. Any form of indecent exposure will not be tolerated and will result in our security team issuing an immediate ban from the centre and reporting any incident to Nottinghamshire Police."

These images led to uproar from female social media users, highlighting the issue of allowing people with penises into spaces meant for people without penises. It's quite simple, really: some areas just aren't hospitable to penises. If every penis would just remain in its penis-designated areas, so many of the world's current problems could be solved overnight.

\u201cThe Equality Act allows men like Rosemary Times to be excluded from women\u2019s spaces but partly thanks to misinformation spread by organisations such as Stonewall, many organisations don\u2019t realise they can\n\nSign the petition to #MakeTheEqualityActClear\n\nhttps://t.co/Q7dMLaS9df\u201d
— Le_Sorelle_Arduino KPSS (@Le_Sorelle_Arduino KPSS) 1673772154
\u201c@ElizaPetch @angelaeagle The flasher's called Rosemary Times.He was exposing himself in the House of Fraser store in Nottingham:\nhttps://t.co/JxBYbXeE2S\nHe illustrates perfectly well why women don't want men in their changing rooms,no matter how they 'identify'.Most trans 'women' are hetero intact blokes\u201d
— Angela Eagle DBE (@Angela Eagle DBE) 1673986059

In one Flickr post, Rosemary explained why he prefers not to wear underwear in public: "Not wearing any [panties] made me feel very sexy, so I couldn't resist showing my hold-up stockings and a little bit more of me too." His Flickr account has since been deleted, along with his Instagram and TikTok.

Rosemary also had an XVideos account where he uploaded sexually explicit videos of himself masturbating outside in women's clothing. His profile said he "love[s] to go out in public crossdressed, play with my lady penis." Because what else is a guy supposed to do in his free time if not play with his "lady penis."

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Watch: Influencer brags the $35000 vagina 'she' bought is way better than that one you were born with
entries.description:
Non-binary and transwomen have a new target for their anger: women. Apparently, women who were born that way are no longer enamored by trans activists and influencers invading their safe spaces. And those trans influencers are fighting back by iusedtobeamansplaining girlhood to women and telling them to stifle it. That includes the cheap-ass vaginas they got for free by being "born." It's waaaay cooler to buy a vagina for tens of thousands of dollars.

The internet was a mistake.

Happy Wednesday.

Here is a male telling females that our anatomy is garbage compared to man-made "vaginas" 🙃pic.twitter.com/Jbl5cjOauI
— Dr. Sydney Watson (@SydneyLWatson) January 18, 2023
People are really out here saying trans coochie is the inferior product?

No. What people are saying is...honestly, I don't have the strength.

We have the designer bougie coochie. Like, you're telling me if someone says "would you like these free paper bag that came with my groceries, or would you like this $35000 dollar bag," you're taking the designer Birkin.

Bougie coochie. That's a thing now.

You're just mad because trans girls don't want to put trash like you in our designer bags.

I'll give Pinky Transcadaro credit. If this video is to be believed, they chopped their winky off and are at least committing to the gommick. Pinky isn't pretending and selling products for holes they don't have.

But I'm at a point where most TikTok videos need to be paired with this Andrew Schulz clip.

View this post on Instagram
A post shared by Robert Tangipa Entwistle (@op_studios916)
In China, the way that the algorithm works, it doesn't reward people doing stupid dances and playing with their dog. The algorithm is rewarding that they want to see their youth do. So, people doing cool engineering sh*t. People doing cool science sh*t. But if you're China and you wanted to disrupt another country, wouldn't you reward the dumbest possible sh*t on that app?

China gets science and engineering. America gets bougie coochie.

entries.title: Elon Musk makes clear what the people DON'T want after listening to the insane things being said at the WEF
entries.description:
Earlier today, Elon Musk joined the chorus of people questioning the World Economic Forum's authority in governing our everyday lives. In response to a clip from the forum, Musk tweeted, "WEF is increasingly becoming an unelected world government that the people never asked for and don’t want."

\u201c@disclosetv WEF is increasingly becoming an unelected world government that the people never asked for and don\u2019t want\u201d
— Disclose.tv (@Disclose.tv) 1673978681

In the clip, Klaus Schwab explained that the WEF's Metaverse can be trusted because INTERPOL will help ensure the system is "as safe as it can be." INTERPOL stands for The International Criminal Police Organization, a global police force headquartered in France. So, we're supposed to feel better about all this weird Metaverse mumbo jumbo because the WEF's international police force will be enforcing the law around it. So comforting.

Musk is totally right, of course. The WEF is trying to become a global government that supersedes all other nations. Here are a few of the greatest hits from Davos this week that prove Musk's point:

Johan Rockstrom, Director of the Potsdam Institute for Climate Impact Research, claimed not only are we in a climate crisis but also a "planetary crisis" that demands immediate action.

\u201cNOW - World Economic Forum declares a "planetary" and "justice" crisis.\u201d
— Disclose.tv (@Disclose.tv) 1674048395

Fawn Sharp, President of the National Congress of American Indians, claimed climate change is a "spiritual" fight while donning a very funky hat.

\u201cA panelist at the World Economic Forum said the climate change issue is a \u201cspiritual\u201d fight.\n\nYou may not want to admit it, but she\u2019s correct. \n\nThe climate issue \u2014 like the rest of the globalist agenda \u2014 begs the question: \n\nWill we serve God or man?\n\nhttps://t.co/5vycILyxwg\u201d
— Addison Smith (@Addison Smith) 1674055718

Al Gore may have accidentally let us in on an administration secret when he said the Inflation Reduction Act is actually a climate bill. I mean, we could've guessed, since it actually made inflation worse...which isn't exactly what you want...from an inflation REDUCTION act...but I digress.

\u201cAl Gore: "The Inflation Reduction Act...is PRIMARILY a climate act."\u201d
— Daily Caller (@Daily Caller) 1674067470

This next one hurts a bit since Joe Manchin has been the only thing in the way of Senate Democrats passing their kooky legislation. Manchin claimed the problem America has is...the open press.

\u201cJoe Manchin main problem is an open press!!! \n\nWhat a tyrant! \nhttps://t.co/BOVrD3YCqD\u201d
— Luke Rudkowski (@Luke Rudkowski) 1673999337

An open press is definitely not on the list of main problems in America. Just ask the New York Post.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Watch: Media goes into meltdown because a single NHL player didn't wear an LGBTQ jersey
entries.description:
The NHL was among the last bastion of sports where you could watch a game without having woke politics crammed down your throat. Unfortunately, the left noticed that too many cis white men were enjoying something at the same time. The NHL needs to bend the knee now. They attempted to have a job fair that discriminated against able-bodied white men until Ron DeSantis said "not in Florida." Now there's an issue with an LGBTQ hockey jersey.

Not even a real jersey. A practice jersey. NHL ordered players to wear an LGBTQ jersey during warm-ups. It's the only way to let people know "hockey is for everyone" as opposed to just playing hockey. One lone player, Ivan Provorov from the Philadelphia Flyers, didn't want to wear the jersey due to his religious beliefs. So he quietly didn't come out for warm-ups. Then he came out to play the game.

Here Ivan is saying he respects everyone's decisions. He had a decision to make himself.

I respect everyone. I respect everybody’s choices.

NOPE! We can't have one lone person thinking for themselves or going against the herd. He must be made to care. If he is not going to wear the shirt, he shouldn't be allowed to play AT ALL.

Let me get this straight, you have a player that OPENLY declines to participate in an inclusive initiative for a community I am proud to be a part of. And you still dress him in the game? Be better @NHLFlyers https://t.co/rSyV6D35Oo
— Erin Ambrose (@ambrose_13) January 18, 2023

Surprising to no one, the woke media agrees.

Players and individuals are allowed to have their beliefs, and we're allowed to form opinions based on them. But when they refuse to participate in a team initiative? They shouldn't get to play
— Pete Blackburn (@PeteBlackburn) January 18, 2023

This guy is full of shit. And if a player took a stand against not wearing a cross, he would be hailed in the press as a hero.

It would depend on why the NHL wanted me to wear the cross. If Christians were being persecuted just for being Christians and the league asked me to wear the cross for support, damn right I would. Doesn’t mean I believe in Christianity. https://t.co/CrrHThR0PX
— Stefen Rosner (@stefen_rosner) January 18, 2023

This guy went on an angry rant that banning the player isn't enough. The Flyers should be fined A MILLION DOLLARS. All because one guy -- a single person -- chose not to wear a shirt.

Philadelphia Flyers defenseman Ivan Provorov didn’t take part in the NHL’s “Hockey Is For Everyone” pregame warmups - where players wore Pride-themed jerseys and used sticks wrapped in rainbow Pride tape - citing his religion as the reason. @sid_seixeiro shares his thoughts ⬇️ pic.twitter.com/8c7XnP2FYJ
— Breakfast Television (@breakfasttv) January 18, 2023

It's all performative and isn't meant for gay hockey fans. Gays fans don't need to be told something is "for them." They turn on a game and enjoy the fights that break out the same as everyone else does. No one pays attention to the warm-ups, let alone knows -- or cares -- that Ivan Provorov from the Flyers didn't warm up.

Nights like this are for no reason other than it allows "diversity consultants" to guilt an insane monthly retainer out of organizations. And so activists and journalsimers can revel in the smell of their own farts over how incusive'y and tolerent-ish they're being.

One lone man decided for himself not to take part. Burn him!

Editor’s Note

entries.title: 'They have no clue': Activist exposes how he sells CRT to public schools by skirting state law
entries.description:
Last night, Project Veritas exposed Dr. Quintin Bostic, the Director of the nonprofit educational organization Teaching Lab HQ, for violating state law and secretly selling Critical Race Theory to schools.

\u201cBREAKING: @TeachingLabHQ Director @DrQuintinBostic Admits Violating State Law; Sells Critical Race Theory Curriculum to Schools\n\n'If you don't say the word "critical race theory," you can teach it...I'm an evil salesman...They[State] have no clue...He's[@GovKemp] such an idiot'\u201d
— Project Veritas (@Project Veritas) 1673996406

Teaching Lab HQ describes itself as "a “non-profit organization whose mission is to fundamentally shift the paradigm of teacher professional learning for educational equity.”

As Director, Dr. Bostic's job includes selling curriculum to school districts. He told the undercover Veritas journalist he has sold his curriculum to Fulton and Cobb Counties in Georgia.

His curriculum secretly includes Critical Race Theory, even in the curriculum for kindergarteners, by branding it as "Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion." He said this branding “is more accepted than, like, anti-racist education or Critical Race Theory” and helps bypass Georgia State Laws against CRT.

At one point during the video, Bostic said, "I would say I’m a good salesman, but I’m also an evil salesman.” He went on to describe Governor Kemp as "an idiot," and that the Georgia State government has no idea what is in his curriculum.

Bostic's goal is “to get the kids to influence their parents to make the [ideological] shift too.” He noted that if Kemp's wife, who's heavily involved in education, found out about his actions, he would "get nailed." But don't worry, every evil salesman has a contingency plan! If his business license is taken from him, he said he can keep consulting.

I don't know about you, but I'm thinking this must be some more selectively edited, extremist far-right propaganda from Mr. O'Keefe. After all, we've been reliably informed time and again that Critical Race Theory in schools actually doesn't exist, has never been taught, and is a completely fabricated concept designed to raise a young army of white supremacists. So, nice try, Project Veritas. Better luck next time.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Update: That video of Greta Thunberg being yeeted by police was apparently staged for the press
entries.description:
On Tuesday, we covered a story featuring our favorite climate warrior, Greta Thunberg. She was reportedly carried away by German Police after refusing to leave an Antifa autonomous zone where there was simultaneously a protest over a coal mine that had to be expanded to prevent Germans from freezing to death. Lots going on across the pond these days.

\u201c\ud83d\udea8BREAKING: Greta Thunberg is detained by police during climate protests in Germany\n\n\u201d
— Benny Johnson (@Benny Johnson) 1673975781

I love her smug little face as she's being carried away. Look at that smile. A true hero.

\u201cV\u00eda @elpaisinenglish |\u00a0Police in western Germany carried Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg and other protesters away Tuesday from the edge of an open coal pit mine where they demonstrated against the ongoing destruction of a village\nhttps://t.co/DiAkLLCY4z\u201d
— EL PA\u00cdS M\u00e9xico (@EL PA\u00cdS M\u00e9xico) 1674051185

Anywho, the entire thing was apparently staged for the press. A newly circulating video shows Greta and the police laughing together and posing for a photo op just moments before the police yeeted her away.

\u201cYes, the Greta Thunberg arrest was staged for the establishment media.\u201d
— Catch Up (@Catch Up) 1673993443

This took place just a day after a violent clash between police and climate activists/Antifa at the site of the protest. A reported 70 police officers were injured with projectiles, stones, mud, and fireworks in a violent clash with climate activists and Antifa. So after the officers fought for their lives against deranged communists, they had to physically remove Greta - for the content, of course.

This is all too reminiscent of last July when AOC appeared to pretend to be handcuffed as she was led away from an abortion protest.

\u201cIdk. Here you are @aoc breaking your fake handcuff pose for a good fist pump and shout out to the crowd - looking \u201ctough\u201d! Good theater though\u2026 \ud83d\udcaa\ud83e\udd37\ud83c\udffb\u200d\u2640\ufe0f\ud83e\udd42\u201d
— Nancy Mace (@Nancy Mace) 1658341839

AOC's fellow 'Squad' members Ilhan Omar, Rashida Tlaib, and Ayanna Pressley were also reportedly arrested and issued $50 fines for obstructing traffic. Oh and this entire arrest was reportedly staged, too, and was organized by the Center for Popular Democracy Action Fund, a Soros-funded dark money group.

And who could forget back in 2018, when Amy Schumer told police she wanted to be arrested at the Brett Kavanaugh protest.

\u201cHere is @amyschumer telling cops she *wants* to be arrested. \n\nCop asks \u201cDo you want to be arrested?\u201d \n\nSchumer: \u201cYes.\u201d \n\nSave this for the \u201cI can\u2019t believe I was arrested for free speech!\u201d Tweet from her soon.\u201d
— Benny Johnson (@Benny Johnson) 1538682314

Nothing says "brave, life-changing activism" like literally requesting to be arrested because no one actually cares about what you're doing or who you are. Keep up the good fight, ladies!

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Watch: World's dumbest 'Celebrity Jeopardy' contestants don't know what Iowa is
entries.description:
SNL had a reoccurring sketch mocking what dum-dums celebrities are when they appeared on 'Celebrity Jeopardy.' It's where we got such classics as Norm MacDonald's impersonation of Burt Reynolds, "the penis mightier," and Sean Connery finding new ways to describe having sex with Alex Trebek's mother.

The sketch became reality in this viral clip from the celebrity edition of the show. None of them what Iowa was. Yes, Iowa. The state. In America.

That’s it. Cancel Celebrity Jeopardy! forever. pic.twitter.com/bn7U2QdLUu
— Owen Siebring (@owensiebring) January 15, 2023
In 'Field of Dreams' a question is asked, 'Is this heaven?' - No, it's this midwestern state also known as 'the corn state.'

The only celebrity I recognize is alleged comedian and former friend of Dave Chappelle, Patton Oswalt. He was smart enough to keep his mouth shut so as not to expose his idiocy.

Torrey DeVitto, who the internet tells me is an actress, said "Wisconsin." WRONG! Wisconsin is known for the show Happy Days, cheese, and 2nd amendment influencer Kyle Rittenhouse.

Candace Parker, who the internet tells me plays for something called the WNBA, said "Nebraska." NOPE! Nebraska is known for Larry the Cable Guy, former Senator Ben Sasse, and...I don't know, I guess this guy.

It's not like we expect celebrities to be among our best a brightest. Sure, corporate media will pretend they are when the celebrity has a leftist political opinion they agree with. But out in normal America -- like IOWA -- there is no expectation of celelbrity smarts. These three managed to not even exceed already low expectations.

Like, if you lay the bar on the ground and tell someone to step over it, these are three chuckleheads who still would not be able to clear it.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Another - former man - gets a tampon endorsement deal without having any biological use for the applicator
entries.description:
Jeffrey Marsh has a pee-pee. He was given an endorsement deal to sell products for people who have a woo-woo. Also known as "women," to those of you who don't share the political belief that hims can be hers and curse your transphobism for saying otherwise! Though, in Jeffrey's defense, they are a they. So unlike others, they are at least not pretending they have a use for a...

Just watch the video.

Jeffrey Marsh has become the latest man to reveal he has been paid to advertise tampons (believed to be Tampax). He says he did it because he wants women to stop hating themselves so much pic.twitter.com/yDJDR7IFz2
— ripx4nutmeg (@ripx4nutmeg) January 10, 2023

Jeffrey said they took the tampon endorsement deal because Jeffrey wants to end the stigmatization of menstruation, which Jeffrey does not do, so that women and anyone who was a woman but now claims to be a man can stop feeling that menstruation is so icky and gross.

The other reason is due to all the women who were born that way sending Jeffrey hate. Because, as Jeffrey says, they should all be working together to smash the patriarchy.

Now, I'm not a woman. I wasn't born one and don't identify as one now. Far be it for me to speak on their behalf. But if I were to guess, women aren't attacking Jeffrey because of how Jeffrey identifies. Women are attacking Jeffrey because Jeffrey is mocking and ridiculing women and all their biological functions with videos like this. If I hated women and wanted to record a video making fun of women based on my stereotype of women, it would look no different than some of these alleged influencers celebrating day eleventy-five of being a girl.

Also -- and again, I'm not a woman so I'm just spitballing here -- I doubt women who were born with use for a tampon appreciate potential financial opportunities given instead to a non-vagina'd individual. Stolen from them like it's a high school track scholarship.

Why stop with a two-minute TikTok? If tampon providers really want to show the world how they are for "all" women, they should get Jeffrey, Dylan Mulvaney, and LwC Women of the Year Kayla Lemieux all in the same tampon commercial. They can cover Shania Twain's "Damn, I Feel Like a Woman" with a bunch of Rachel Levine lookalikes dancing behind them.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Watch: Woke sellout Howard Stern shames his producer's son for hugging his dad, not being masked up
entries.description:
Mythinformed MKE (a great follow) was yeeted off of Twitter for a while. Cousin Elon gave them their account back, and they've been unloading all the tweets they weren't able to during their time in the wilderness. One was this Howard Stern clip from the early part of the pandemic. We were only five months past fifteen days to flatten the curve.

Stern was talking to his producer BABA BOOEY when BABA BOOEY'S son returned from college. He hugged his dad, as one does when they haven't seen a parent for an extended period of time. Stern went bananas. He shamed the son and accused him of almost giving BABA BOOEY schmovid.

Remember when Howard Stern put his co-host’s son through a COVID struggle session after hugging his dad? pic.twitter.com/MkalKXDP3L
— Mythinformed MKE (@MythinformedMKE) January 17, 2023

I missed this clip the first go around. We didn't pick up on what a corporate sellout to the government Stern had become until he accused Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers of murder. SPOILER: Rodgers was right all along. Stern went on to blame Kirstie Alley's colon cancer on her opposing government mandates.

But even early on in the pandemic when I now regretfully took part in some craziness, there was never a point where I didn't hug or show affection to family members. My guess is many other people acted the same. No matter how many virtue-signalling songs they sang about being hashtag all in this together, they were hugging family members and not walking around their homes masked up. They only pretended to be about the elbow bumps when the cameras were on and they were performing for a captive audience.

Stern is one of the few who fell for the narrative in ernest. He comes across as a recluse who did, in fact, walk around his house in a mask and refused to let loved ones get within six feet of him, let alone touch him. I wonder how many of his colleagues and employees humored on camera but were then laughing at him in the privacy of their own homes.

I also feel bad for BABA BOOEY'S son. The Howard Stern when we were in college was much cooler. That Stern would be laughing at this Stern too.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Watch: Smug 'influencer' whines old man is ruining her live stream as he lets her know how little he gives a rip
entries.description:
There are few people more deserving of ridicule than unironic influencers. It's pronounced "in-flu-ence-rrrrrrrrrr" as if you are a valley girl from the 80s. So when there is a dispute in a park between an old man sitting on a bench and an in-flu-ence-rrrrrrrrrr carrying on about her live stream, the old man is always in the right.

The low-key best part about the video is how ridiculous some of the words said online sound when part of an IRL conversation.

Chad park man puts snotty influencer in her place. pic.twitter.com/FyO8JWbJ0y
— Catch Up (@CatchUpNetwork) January 17, 2023

The dispute can best be summarized with the in-flu-ence-rrrrrrrrrr being all "but muh live stream" and the old man being all "piss on your live stream." That was the old man's bench. He sits on it every day and he was going to sit on it that day. When the in-flu-ence-rrrrrrrrrrs and the followers and the whole internet tell you to move, your job is to plant yourself like a tree beside the river of truth, and tell the in-flu-ence-rrrrrrrrrrs — “No, you move.”

The in-flu-ence-rrrrrrrrrr kept carrying on about her followers and how she was trying to film a nice fitness video for her followers and how her followers didn't want to see an old man sitting on a park bench. Her followers want to see HER. At this point, the man ended the argument.

Your followers. Oh, are you Jesus now, are you?

Sorry, I take it back. The man only mostly ended the argument. This was the mic drop after the in-flu-ence-rrrrrrrrrr whined that it wasn't fair.

Are you from that snow flake brigade, are you?

Boom. After three rounds, the old man is declared the winner by TKO. The in-flu-ence-rrrrrrrrrr goes on to join our gallery of self-professed social media influencers getting their comeuppance content. The old man got to rest his legs.

Editor’s Note
